type.description: The type of the event, always `response.output_text.annotation.added`.

sequence_number.description: The sequence number of the event that was emitted.

item_id.description: The ID of the item that was updated.

output_index.description: The index of the output item that was updated.

content_index.description: The index of the output text content that was updated.

annotation_index.description: The index of the annotation that was added.

type.description: The type of the URL citation. Always `url_citation`.

url.description: The URL of the web resource.

start_index.description: The index of the first character of the URL citation in the message.

end_index.description: The index of the last character of the URL citation in the message.

title.description: The title of the web resource.

oneOf.title: URL citation
oneOf.description: A citation for a web resource used to generate a model response.

allOf.description: An annotation that applies to a span of output text.
An annotation that applies to a span of output text.

title: Response output text annotation added event
description: A streaming event that indicated an output text annotation was added.
